com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions
Class DataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions.DataSourceAction<X>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiDataSourceAction, SingleDataSourceAction
public abstract class DataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>
extends AbstractAction

Abstract Action which can be used as a basis for any DataSource-aware action.

Author:
Jiri Sedlacek
See Also:
Serialized Form

updateState

protected abstract void updateState(Set<X> selectedDataSources)
Updates enabled state based on currently selected DataSources in Applications window.

notifyCannotPerform

protected void notifyCannotPerform()
Displays a dialog that the action cannot be invoked in current context.

initialize

protected void initialize()
Initializes the action. By default registers selection listener which invokes updateState(Set) on selection change.
